revised_title: Erratum: Diffraction of Elastic Waves by a Wedge with Free Boundaries
tldr: This article is an erratum for a previous paper on the diffraction of elastic waves by a wedge with free boundaries. The author corrects a mistake in the original paper, stating that the complete elastodynamic field cannot be found using half-range Fourier sine series alone. Instead, a half-range cosine series must also be added to satisfy the equations of motion and Hooke's law in the interior of the wedge.
